snippet: A new restaurant opens at the Public Theater, Picholine on the Upper West Side reopens and Gowanus now has the Pines.
abstract: Restaurants Brooklyn Central, China Latina, Fabbrica, Jeepney, La Dame De Pic, The Library at the Public, Picholine, The Pines, Strip House Midtown, Sushi of Gari Tribeca and Taim Nolita open in New York City.
lead_paragraph: A new restaurant opens at the Public Theater, Picholine on the Upper West Side reopens and Gowanus now has the Pines.

headline.seo: A New Restaurant Opens at the Public Theater, Picholine Reopens and More
